title: Exploring Excellence Indicators in Mobile-Based Elementary Mathematics Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and mobile device usage skills
context.additional_context: A course aimed at strengthening elementary mathematics instructional design capabilities in microlearning environments utilizing smartphones. Includes learning mobile-optimized content development and evaluation methods in PC-unavailable settings

learning_goals: Establish an elementary mathematics instructional design framework based on mobile analysis of 35 excellence indicators from an IDT program.
Identify five or more technical/educational factors to consider when designing microlearning content via smartphones.
Develop mobile-optimized elementary mathematics instructional design prototypes individually/team-based through project-based assessment and conduct peer evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
